channel.title: bryan-vandenbrink on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in bryan-vandenbrink on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I first became interested in research during my undergrad at UoG, where I completed a BSc in Bio-Medical Science with a minor in Zoology. In my free time I am either volunteering at Wild Ontario where we train non-releasable raptors for use in educational programming, or spending time outside.
